Package org.bremersee.xml

Interface SchemaBuilder

public interface SchemaBuilder
The schema builder wraps the standard SchemaFactory of Java into a builder. It also offers the ability to load schema using Spring's ResourceLoader.
Author:
Christian Bremer

    • withSchemaLanguage

      SchemaBuilder withSchemaLanguage(String schemaLanguage)
      Specifies the schema language.

      Default is javax.xml.XMLConstants.W3C_XML_SCHEMA_NS_URI ("http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema").

      Parameters:
      schemaLanguage - specifies the schema language which the used schema factory will understand
      Returns:
      the schema builder
      See Also:
      • SchemaFactory.newInstance(String)

    • withFactory

      Specifies the factory to use.
      Parameters:
      factoryClassName - the factory class name
      Returns:
      the schema builder
      See Also:
      • SchemaFactory.newInstance(String, String, ClassLoader)

    • withResourceLoader

      SchemaBuilder withResourceLoader(org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader resourceLoader)
      Specifies the resource loader to use. The resource loader is used to retrieve the xsd files that are specified in the schema location (see fetchSchemaSources(String...)).

      Default is DefaultResourceLoader.

      Parameters:
      resourceLoader - the resource loader
      Returns:
      the schema builder

    • withResourceResolver

      SchemaBuilder withResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver resourceResolver)
      Specifies the resource resolver to use.
      Parameters:
      resourceResolver - the resource resolver
      Returns:
      the schema builder
      See Also:
      • SchemaFactory.setResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver)

    • fetchSchemaSources

      default List<Source> fetchSchemaSources(String... locations)
      Retrieves the schema files of the specified locations.

      The location can have any format that is supported by the ResourceLoader.

      Parameters:
      locations - the locations
      Returns:
      the list
      See Also:
      • withResourceLoader(ResourceLoader)

    • fetchSchemaSources

      List<Source> fetchSchemaSources(Collection<String> locations)
      Retrieves the schema files of the specified locations.

      The location can have any format that is supported by the ResourceLoader.

      Parameters:
      locations - the locations
      Returns:
      the schema files as source list
      See Also:
      • withResourceLoader(ResourceLoader)

    • buildSchema

      default Schema buildSchema(String... locations)
      Retrieves the schema files of the specified locations and builds the schema.

      The location can have any format that is supported by the ResourceLoader.

      Parameters:
      locations - the locations
      Returns:
      the schema
